sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO WX_MSG_NEWS (ID, ITEM_ID , TITLE , DESCRIPTION , PICURL , URL , AUTHOR , AUTHOR_ID , CREATED , LAST_MODIFIED , LAST_MODIFY_ID , SORT_ID ) VALUES (#id#, #itemId# , #title# , #description# , #picurl# , #url# , #author# , #authorId# , #created# , #lastModified# , #lastModifyId# , #sortId# )

INSERT INTO WX_MSG_NEWS (ID, ITEM_ID , TITLE , DESCRIPTION , PICURL , URL , AUTHOR , AUTHOR_ID , CREATED , LAST_MODIFIED , LAST_MODIFY_ID , SORT_ID ) VALUES (_nextval('WX_MSG_NEWS'), #itemId# , #title# , #description# , #picurl# , #url# , #author# , #authorId# , #created# , #lastModified# , #lastModifyId# , #sortId# )
SELECT _currval('WX_MSG_NEWS') as id
sqlMap.update: update WX_MSG_NEWS set ITEM_ID = #itemId# , TITLE = #title# , DESCRIPTION = #description# , PICURL = #picurl# , URL = #url# , AUTHOR = #author# , AUTHOR_ID = #authorId# , CREATED = #created# , LAST_MODIFIED = #lastModified# , LAST_MODIFY_ID = #lastModifyId# , SORT_ID = #sortId# where ID=#id#
sqlMap.select: select count(*) from (select ID id , ITEM_ID itemId , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , PICURL picurl , URL url , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_NEWS) t

select ID id , ITEM_ID itemId , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , PICURL picurl , URL url , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_NEWS t order by sortid

select ID id , ITEM_ID itemId , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , PICURL picurl , URL url , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_NEWS t where t.ID=#id#

select * from (select ID id , ITEM_ID itemId , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , PICURL picurl , URL url , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_NEWS) t
order by $orderByClause$
sqlMap.delete: delete from WX_MSG_NEWS where ID in (select t.id from (select ID id , ITEM_ID itemId , TITLE title , DESCRIPTION description , PICURL picurl , URL url , AUTHOR author , AUTHOR_ID authorId , CREATED created , LAST_MODIFIED lastModified , LAST_MODIFY_ID lastModifyId , SORT_ID sortId from WX_MSG_NEWS) t )
